Introducing EFI Radius

Flexible

Functionality to meet any packaging manufacturing discipline

Productive

Powerful productivity solutions to optimise your business.

Automated

Automated workflows to drive productivity and efficiency.

Scalable

Complete end-to-end business integration

A Complete Packaging ERP Software Solution

Packaging industry leaders producing tag and label, folding carton, flexible packaging and other printed materials rely on the EFI Radius Packaging ERP software solution to facilitate the collection and integration of company-wide information to enable more profitable and effective business management.

What Does Radius Give Your Business?

EFI Radius been optimized over many years of servicing a global Packaging customer base and as such represents the most complete Packaging ERP software solution on the market. Some of the unique capabilities include:

A Complete end-to-end business integration solution
Remote CRM and customer portal tools
Multi-language, -currency, -company and –plant flexibility
Industry-specific software development, training and support
Estimating and production scheduling for label, folding carton, and flexible packaging workflows
Modern intuitive user interface with open API connectivity
Advanced business contingency workflow solutions

Keep Your Business Running in Times of Crisis

EFI Radius has been specifically designed to give you all the capabilities and confidence needed to run a successful packaging manufacturing business.
